This study test hypothesis betaine induces FGF21 secretion insulin sensitize action human measure plasma FGF21 , betaine , choline ( betaine precursor ) , glucose , insulin adiponectin response betaine supplementation 24 hour time course 20 healthy , lean individual . This pilot nutrition intervention provide key preliminary evidence understand whether betaine exerts metabolic benefit human inform future study investigate novel betaine-FGF21-insulin sensitivity axis large cohort .
